programme.title: Aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Los padres recuerdan los primeros pasos de los niños, pero ellos los recuerdan de una forma diferente. Angélica contrata a Harold para que sea su asistente personal.

programme.title: Aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Cuando los cachorros de Firulais y Fifi son puestos en adopción, Hugo le ruega a Didi que se queden con uno. Los bebés se embarcan en una fantasía, batallando a la Malvada Señorita Angelique en una exótica tienda de mascotas.

programme.title: Aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Los bebés se dirigen al Club Fred, un lugar para descansar y relajarse. Una vez allí, los bebés deben encontrar el tesoro de Barba Azul para salvarle las vacaciones a todos.

programme.title: Aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Lili está preocupada porque no es tan perfecta como podría ser, pero luego descubre que disfruta más de su verdadero yo que el que finge ser.

programme.title: Aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Los bebés se divierten en el parque de diversiones de alta tecnología con temática de Navidad diseñado por Stu Pickles para la primera Navidad de Dil. Angélica hace que Santa renuncie.

programme.title: Aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Los bebés descubren que la Navidad significa más que regalos y tradiciones, cuando se encuentran atrapados en las decoraciones navideñas de Hugo. Angélica impulsa a Santa a renunciar.

programme.title: Aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Cuando llevan a los bebés al circo, Carlitos teme convertirse en un payaso. Cuando Angélica ve una entrega de premios en televisión, los bebés deciden hacer su propia entrega de premios.

programme.title: Aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Los bebés encuentran una galería de juegos medievales que los lleva a una fantasía para salvar a Taffy de un feroz dragón llamado Gracko. Los bebés intentan hacer más fuerte a Dil para que pueda jugar con ellos.

programme.title: Aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Los bebés asisten a un juego de básquet y defienden a la mascota del equipo visitante: un bicho gigante. Angélica quiere la sala para ella sola.

programme.title: Aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Kimi es elegida para hacer una audición para una película, y le dicen que será una estrella. Los bebés creen que vivirá en el cielo. Los bebés creen que Taffy y Angélica intercambiaron identidades.

programme.title: Aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Angélica le dice a los bebés que Carlitos es un extraterrestre del espacio y que la casa es su nave. Carlitos tiene temor de tocar cosas por miedo a tener contacto con gérmenes.

programme.title: Aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: El cachorro de los Finster está triste, y los bebés creen que es porque aún no le dieron un nombre. Por otro lado, una amiga de Betty viene de visita con su hija Alice, justo cuando los reportes climáticos predicen un huracán, también llamado Alice.

programme.title: Aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Hugo, Chas, Angélica y Susie van con sus mascotas a un concurso para disputar el premio de Mejor Mascota. Taffy lleva a los bebés a su primera visita a un restaurante de comida rápida.

programme.title: Aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Los bebés acompañan a sus mamás a la venta anual para bebés, pero ellos creen que serán vendidos. Los bebés hacen un bebé de nieve y lo llaman Steve.

programme.title: Aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Tommy pierde la paciencia en un juego y Angélica desafía a los demás. Por otro lado, Didi lleva a los bebés a la universidad y viven una aventura en el campus.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Carl is here today to tell his girlfriend that he's been sleeping with her sworn enemy, Keisha. Next Donte will tell his best friend, Quincy, that he's sleeping with his fiancé. Later Janel and Nikkie are fighting over the same man.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Sarah's here for Jonathan. The only problem is Lana, her best friend, who just happens to be Jonathan's girlfriend. Next Kung-fu family feud! David's here to let his brother, Lil Wayne, know that he has been sleeping with his girlfriend Ashley.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Michael is here to reveal to his girl Tiffany that he may have gone a little too far with her sister when he let her practice her stripper moves on him. Now he's worried sick that Tiffany will never forgive him.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: First, Linda has slept with her daughter's husband, Torrey. Now he wants nothing to do with his mother-in-law or his marriage! Next Juan had sex with his fiancee's transsexual uncle and he's here to plead forgiveness from her.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Amanda found love bites on her husband's neck so she kicked him out! Then, Amy suspects her husband is cheating, little did she know who it'd be with! Next, Christina says that if her boyfriend doesn't shape up, she's leaving him for her other lover!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Kim and Kristie are identical twins and Kristie is planning to marry Michael but there's a catch. Later Louis has some explaining to do. His lover of 8 years has just informed his wife of their affair!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Whilst in jail, Scooter asked his dad, Richard, if his wife, Keri, and their child could move in with him, but he didn't expect Keri and Richard to fall in love!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Craig wants the best for his niece, Krysti, and feels her boyfriend, Randy, isn't right for her. Next Teresa plans to raise her child in the KKK and her fiance, a former Klan member, is here to talk some sense into her.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Arvonda says her fiance can't satisfy her and treats her badly. She'll tell him that she's been sleeping with his best friend, Mike! Next, Teresa has no idea her boyfriend is having an ongoing affair!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Jen is going to tell John that she is dumping him for her secret lover, 73 year old Jerry. Next Danika has a little surprise for her fiancé which she feels compelled to tell him that she's really a man.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Toby says his lover has left him for a jailbird and he needs Jerry's help to get her back.

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Kevis suspects Ashley of cheating, while she accuses him of infidelity. With a lie detector test, Steve aims to uncover the truth and shock them both. Secrets will be revealed, challenging their perceptions and relationship.

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: The laziest husband and wife lie about their child in order to get support from a woman who believes the child is her grandchild.

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Valerie is fed up with her controlling boyfriend Chris. She says he treats her like a prisoner, but he suspects she's cheating! Then, Amanda is in a bad relationship with Joseph. He believes that Amanda cheated and denies fathering her kids!

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Carlton ha venido a revelarle a su novia que lleva una doble vida gay. Además, Tom Bergeron de "Bailando con las Estrellas" de la TV hará de juez famoso en un concurso de baile. Luego, Crystal le revela a su marido, Bobby, su infidelidad.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Jake se acostó con el prometido de su hermano Joe. Después, Danny dice que dejará a su prometida Heather por una dama de compañía profesional llamada Chelsi. Además, hay más historias de matrimonios disparatados.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: John está siendo infiel a su esposa Destinee con Cici, pero Cici también tiene algunos secretos. Entonces, Lala suelta un bombazo a su novio. Además, Michael y su esposa Tayliana tienen secretos que revelarse mutuamente.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Jaycee le demuestra a Brandy que nunca es correcto ser infiel y arruinar a una familia. Casi cree que su prometido podría aprender una lección de Kevin, un antiguo invitado. Además, concertamos una cita entre la espectadora Tamara y el invitado Nathan.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: ¡Anitra se entera de quién es realmente su pareja Kevin! Después, James está a semanas de casarse con Liz, pero tiene dos importantes secretos que contar. Después, Elliot dice que cometió el peor error de su vida al ser infiel a su novio, Rob.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: James está comprometido con Amanda, pero ahora confiesa lo de Melanie. Después, Jewel compite por el amor de su amante cuando Christa anuncia que lo quiere para ella.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Misty odia tanto al marido que se acaba de casar con su mejor amiga que está dispuesta a pagar el divorcio. ¡Lucus está dispuesto a divorciarse de su esposa de 6 semanas si su familia no deja de entrometerse!

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Hope ha venido a enfrentarse a su mejor amiga, Laura, por robarle a su novio, Joey, y luego comprometerse con él. A continuación, John dirá que no tiene la culpa por acostarse con la mejor amiga de su novia.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Kenny vivía con dos hermanas, Lora y Misty, que también son sus amantes, pero las trata como sirvientas. Después, Jerry confronta a Kenny con los resultados de 9 pruebas de paternidad positivas, pero Kenny dice que solamente le importan 2 de sus 9 hijos.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Anita está dispuesta a dejar a su marido por su ex-amante. Luego Theresa está siendo infiel a su prometido con su hermano. Más tarde Kevin viene a decirle al ex de su novia, Jermaine, que se aleje.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Carl ha venido a decirle a su novia que se ha estado acostando con su peor enemiga, Keisha. A continuación, Donte le dirá a su mejor amigo, Quincy, que está acostándose con su prometida. Después, Janel y Nikkie están peleando por el mismo hombre.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Kiki y Kat eran compañeras de trabajo que se enamoraron. ¡Pero ahora Kat dejará a Kiki por un hombre! Después, Cedric viene a decirle a su novia que quiere llevar su relación a otro nivel... y a otra persona.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Fred engañó a su amante Jay, ¡así que ahora Jay quiere su merecido! A continuación, la obsesión de Terry por su panda de peluche está a punto de hacer que su novia se vaya. Después, Benny le dirá a su amigo que usa ropa interior de mujer en secreto.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: ¡Dave cuenta que los regaños constantes de su novia lo han arrojado a los brazos de una mujer de 72 años! A continuación, Joe está a punto de decirle a su hermosa novia que tuvo un rollo de una noche con alguien increíble.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Tras ser testigo de la decisión de mudanza de Rosaura, Camelia se apresura a informar a Patricio de lo acontecido con el abandono de su esposa. Marybella se insinúa ante Luis Mario.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Rosaura esta desconcertada al saber que Luis Mario se involucro sentimentalmente con otra mujer. Caridad intenta tranquilizarla con sus palabras.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain A Cook's Tour

programme.title: Titans of the 20th Century
programme.desc: Masking his disability in a way that would not be possible today, Franklin Delano Roosevelt reaches the Oval Office. The crash of ’29 morphs seamlessly into the Great Depression that reaches every country on earth.

programme.title: Titans of the 20th Century
programme.desc: The threat of war seems to intensify: war reaches Ethiopia with the Italian invasion and threatens in Europe with the German occupation of the Rhineland and annexation of Austria.

programme.title: Titans of the 20th Century

programme.title: Titans of the 20th Century

programme.title: Titans of the 20th Century

programme.title: Inventions That Shook The World

programme.title: Inventions That Shook The World

programme.title: Inventions That Shook The World

programme.title: Inventions That Shook The World

programme.title: Inventions That Shook The World
programme.desc: War is the driving force behind much of the innovation in the 1940s. The microwave is born after a self-taught inventor realizes that military equipment is responsible for melting a chocolate bar in his pocket.

programme.title: Inventions That Shook The World

programme.title: Inventions That Shook The World

programme.desc: In Cincinnati, Detectives Matt Thompson and Doug Lindle are investigating the double homicide of a local hairdresser and his elderly neighbor, both stabbed to death and set on fire. When detectives discover that one of the victim's cars is missing.

programme.title: I Shouldn't Be Alive

programme.title: I Shouldn't Be Alive

programme.title: I Shouldn't Be Alive

programme.desc: A college student collapses in the ER, and doctors do hours of CPR, hoping she'll revive. A man with a 5-hour erection gets caught between his wife and his mistress, and a 70-year-old grandmother wakes up after being pronounced dead.

programme.title: Marido en alquiler

programme.title: Stargate Universe
programme.desc: With the air supply failing on the Destiny, a team disembarks to a desert-like planet in search of a mineral needed to scrub the ship's air of carbon dioxide. While one team presses on to find the vital mineral, the other has another goal in mind.

programme.title: Stargate Universe

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: The Goa'uld send a mothership to Earth, demanding that it prove its superior defenses. As Dr. Weir applies her most expert diplomatic tactics, Jackson and the still-unconscious body of O'Neill are unexpectedly beamed aboard Thor's ship.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: When Jackson contracts a mysterious illness, O'Neill is convinced that a contagion has infected the base and orders a lockdown. But when Jackson reveals that he was actually possessed by Anubis, O'Neill must discover the identity of the new host!

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: O'Neill deals with a visit from the president and negotiations between two warring tribes from Amra. When SG-1 is captured, he's forced to choose between the safety of the team and the fate of a planet, making him question his competency!

programme.title: Stargate SG-1

programme.title: Stargate SG-1

programme.title: Stargate SG-1

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch's tiny fire-eating mother visits and demands that Lurch's employers wait on her boy hand-and-foot after Lurch leads her to believe that it's his house. Lurch revels in the unexpected attention he gets from Morticia and Gomez.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester's electrical output fails abruptly. Should they call a doctor or an electrician to bring Fester back? Morticia prescribes a bowl of porcupine mold, and both she and Gomez agree that long exposure to moon rays would be beneficial.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family would like to vacation on the moon, but the billion-dollar travel cost is slightly prohibitive. Uncle Fester volunteers $21.13 and Morticia, using Gomez's new supercomputer, suggests placing a $2,000 bet on the daily double horse race.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Cousin Itt is advocated as curator of the local zoo. Gomez uses his influence with Park Commissioner Fisk (guest star Alan Reed) to promote Itt for the job, but the zookeepers are convinced the Addamses' cousin should be confined to a cage.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandmama (Blossom Rock) is hauled off to jail for setting up a fortune-telling booth in the Addamses' living room. Gomez (John Astin) volunteers to act as attorney, and the court session becomes a shambles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez (John Astin) loses his memory after hitting his head; he fails to recognize Morticia (Carolyn Jones) and says the house looks like a condemned museum. The Addamses take turns hitting Gomez on the head trying to help him regain his memory.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Thing disappears from his box. Failing to find a single trace of Thing, Gomez (John Astin) conducts an investigation--with all members of the household under suspicion. Also starring Carolyn Jones, Jackie Coogan, and Ted Cassidy.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester applies for a job as an insurance salesman with the same company which is threatening to cancel the Addamses' policy (because Fester keeps blowing things up). Fester convinces the company interviewer that he is qualified for the job.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch becomes inconsolable when Gomez donates the family antique harpsichord to a collector. Gomez and Morticia offer Lurch a balalaika and a set of drums. When this proves unsatisfactory, Gomez and Fester decide to build a new harpsichord.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Morticia hears the stock market has crashed, she assumes that Gomez has been financially wiped out and rallies the family to help make money. Morticia gives lessons, Lurch and Fester run an escort service, and the kids run a poison drink stand.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While enjoying a moonlight picnic and snail hunt, the Addams Family is mistaken for Martians by uniformed investigators from Mysterious Space Objects Headquarters. In turn, Gomez (John Astin) and the clan regard their inquisitors with suspicion.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: An organ grinder's fugitive monkey leads Fester to believe that he has turned Pugsley into a monkey. Morticia and Gomez treat the monkey as though he were their son, welcoming him to the dinner table and giving him Pugsley's chores.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's favorite charity is having an auction--so Morticia persuades her family to part with things to sell. Donations include Wednesday's headless doll, the old flogging table, a stuffed vulture and Uncle Fester's dynamite.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The Addams Family ignores notices that their house is to be condemned to make way for a freeway. When sudden explosions cannot be traced to any member of the family but, instead, to city workmen, Gomez is forced to consider moving the house.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester's pen pal, Madelyn, is coming to visit. Fester panics, as he has described himself as handsome, heroic and romantic. Gomez and Morticia agree that all Fester needs is a toupee and they help him make several styles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez are worried about Cousin Itt because he spends his days sleeping and dreaming in his tiny room. They decide that Itt would make an excellent marriage counselor, and pretend to be a couple with a failing marriage.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: A recording company's platter of Lurch's gravelly voice brings a screaming mob of teenage fans to the Addams house. To calm the crowd, Lurch seats himself at the harpsichord and rewards his fans with a song to end all songs.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Taken in by a psychologist's pronouncement that the only happily married couples are those who fight members of the Addams household devise schemes to start a battle between Gomez (John Astin) and Morticia (Carolyn Jones).

programme.desc: Gomez decides to bolster Cousin Itt's failing ego by making him the star of a production aimed as a birthday surprise for Wednesday. He hires the great director, Eric von Bissell, who gives Itt elocution lessons, causing a Hollywood star complex.

programme.desc: While Morticia and Gomez are celebrating their 13th wedding anniversary, she tells Wednesday and Pugsley a bedtime story of how she and Gomez first met. In this episode, Carolyn Jones plays Morticia, Morticia as a 22-year-old, and sister Ophelia.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley refuse to go to bed until they hear the rest of the courtship story. Morticia resumes the tale via flashback, including the ceremony beginning with Ophelia Frump, Morticia's balmy sister, as the bride.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Romance seems close for Thing, the Addams right-hand-in-a-box, when Gomez's aunt arrives for a visit accompanied by Lady Fingers, her handmaiden. Thing enjoys the visit most because it gives him a chance to hold hands with one of his own kind.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley return in tears from trick-or-treating because a neighbor has told them there is no such thing as a witch. Morticia and Gomez plan to prove to the children that they do exist--by summoning a witch to a séance.

programme.desc: Determined to correct the dreadful literature that Wednesday and Pugsley are exposed to, Morticia sets out to create a new literary world. Gomez fears that his wife's first manuscript is so good, that once the publisher reads it he will lose her.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he braves the mighty Zambezi River in Zambia. Jack gets up and close and personal with the river's inhabitants on a kayaking adventure before heading off on a walking safari with lions and cheetahs.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he explores some of Africa's best national parks, like the world-famous Serengeti, Botswana's Chobe National Park, and Lope National Park in Gabon. Forest elephants, Leopards, Hippos, Crocs and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: The Hanna's are heading to the South Pacific island of Fiji. They get a taste of the local flavor and explore life under the surface, including a scuba diving expedition into shark-infested waters where they come face to face with a huge tiger shark!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Come along with Jack and Suzi for their most incredible Costa Rican adventures, like spotting a wild Jaguar, encountering the land of the stray dogs, and meeting venomous vipers.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Hoof It
programme.desc: Giraffes, zebras, moose and bongo have very different coats, but they all wear the same shoe style. We’re talking about hoofs, of course! Join Jungle Jack as he counts down today’s featured creatures, all the way to number one!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Top of the Class
programme.desc: It's back to school for Jungle Jack as he continues his animal education in all sorts of interesting ways. From ranger school in Africa, to farrier school in Florida, and even zoo school. You never know what you'll learn on this Wild Countdown!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jack behind the scenes for some of his most memorable moments like getting pecked by an ostrich, tangling with a snake, taking fashion advice from a Samburu warrior, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Everybody loves baby animals – especially Jack and Sue! Check out some unpredictable moments from undeniably cute babies like wombats, koalas, elephants -- and even a black rhino named after you know who.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Come along with Jack for his favorite gorilla treks from Rwanda's Virunga Mountains. The Hanna's also visit veterinarians working with the wild gorillas, and a very special orphanage.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: On Vancouver Island, in British Columbia, Jack and his daughter Kathaleen experience Canada from above and below the water.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack's taking a Jungle Cruise through the Amazon as he searches for elusive pink river dolphins. But, along the way, Jack gets a lot more than he bargained for… from a sloth to giant river otters and even anacondas!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack is heading to Mt. Kenya where not one, but two extinct species are about to make a comeback. Come along with Jack as he discovers how the elusive bongo antelope and the stunning white zebra are being reintroduced Into the Wild.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Come along with Jack as he heads to Florida's gulf coast! He and wife Sue learn the truth behind the legends of manatees and mermaids. Then, they get a once-in-a-lifetime experience swimming with manatees in Crystal River.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he honors the hard-working moms of all species, like Brown Bears, Chimpanzees, Elephants, Nyala Antelope, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Living on Land & Sea
programme.desc: Today, species that split their time between dry land and water. From alligators in the Florida Everglades, to elephants in a river in Borneo, and a surprising species that makes its home on a waterfall!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack is heading to Florida to meet some unexpected residents in the small town of Wauchula. Nestled among the orange groves, the Center for Great Apes is providing a loving home to dozens of orangutans and chimpanzees in need.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack is heading to the Wild West to meet up with some of America's most iconic species! Bears, Wolves, Bison, Big Horn Sheep and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jack as he heads to Australia's Gold Coast. Meet a rare blue-eyed koala, feed a Tasmanian devil and watch a tiger jump over Jack! Things get messy when Jack meets up with some boys from the outback and tries his hand at an Aussie tradition.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jack as he heads to the Umfolozi Big 5 Game Reserve in South Africa for amazing animal encounters.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack and Sue travel Down Under to visit one of the newest and greenest animal sanctuaries in Australia. They meet up with an inspiring young couple that is running a totally sustainable B&B while caring for orphaned and injured wildlife.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Hair Raising Adventures
programme.desc: Today, Jack is counting down six nerve-wracking adventures that are NOT for the faint of heart. Diving deep underwater in a submarine, trekking into Mandrill country, coming face-to-face with a mountain lion and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: Jack travels to the Katmai region of Alaska to experience the annual arrival of throngs of brown bears feeding on Sockeye salmon in the Kulik River. Jack encounters bears everywhere, even on a makeshift tundra golf course.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Stuck on You
programme.desc: Today, Jack is counting down animals that count on each other! Birds that groom buffalo, lions that feed jackals, and catfish fed by bats are just some of the amazing symbiotic relationships on this Wild Countdown!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack as he discovers what it’s like to work in the wild thanks to six of the wildest guides ever. African Elephants, Hippos, Guanacos, Gorillas, Wildebeest, Zebra, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jungle for six daring adventures with the King of Beasts! From Lion Cubs in Kenya and rare White Lions in South Africa to a once-in-a-lifetime walk with lions in Zambia, come along for six daring adventures with the ultimate big cats.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jack and his daughter Suzanne as they put their skills to the test at Shamwari's Ranger School where they must experience everything from driving a 4x4, to tracking animals on foot, including a very up-close look at a pride of hungry Lions.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: In Costa Rica, Jack encounters reptiles including an Eye Lash Viper, a huge Python, and the deadly Bushmaster at the World of Snakes. On the Caribbean coast, Jack meets an American couple who has established the Sloth Rehabilitation Center.

programme.desc: They know as much about crime as any crime fighter, or any criminal. They're the crime writers, and through their eyes we see murder most foul.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Forensics in the O.J. Simpson Murder Trial: Millions watched on television as the jury rendered their verdict. Orenthal James Simpson was found not guilty of murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Sometimes the scales of justice are balanced by just a few milligrams of evidence – a couple of fibers, a tooth filling, or a smudge on a piece of tape. The biggest cases are often solved by the smallest clues.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: DNA analysis overturns the convictions of three men who have spent years behind bars, paying for crimes they did not commit.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Toxicology: While drugs can cure disease and ease pain, they can also be agents of murder. Toxicologists can examine blood and tissue to uncover cases where death is not as natural as it may seem–from slow arsenic poisoning to quick cocaine overdoses.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Photography has long been a vital tool in homicide investigations. A single image captures enough information to identify a suspect, and to preserve a vital clue long after a witness' memory fades.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: DNA Analysis: With the advent of DNA analysis, just a few microscopic cells found at a crime scene can be used to put a murder behind bars.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Stolen Youths
programme.desc: A young girl playing in her yard in Spokane, Washington suddenly vanishes. In St. Louis another girl leaves to visit a friend. She never arrives.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: There are several things that can suggest murder; jealousy, anger, poison…When everyday substances reveal hidden clues that break a homicide case, those substances become the elements of murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Missing Person: Approximately 1.8 million Americans are reported missing each year. Worldwide, the number of missing persons nearly triples.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Tool marking: A tool used to commit a crime can often be the same tool used to solve it. The pattern a machine leaves on an item, the unusual way a tool crimps a wire, and even something as innocuous as the shape of a wood chip can lead to a killer.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Camera Clues
programme.desc: Forensic Photography: Forensic photographers are among the first people at a crime scene, capturing vital clues on film. What do the cameras capture that can't be seen first-hand, and who are the men and women who analyze the camera's clues?

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Most victims of multiple murderers are meticulously chosen because of a mutual connection with the killer or because they match an intricate set of criteria that fits the killer's MO.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When killers hide or destroy the remains of their victims, it becomes the mission of forensic scientists to reconstruct the scenes and prove murder for an absent witness.

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: An outsider's arrival forces Alexandria to rehash devastating old wounds; eye-opening secrets from the past are revealed.

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The group in Oceanside continues to train in case the Whisperers return; tensions are high as the heroes struggle to hold onto their concept of civilization.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick y Morgan encuentran una horda descomunal de zombis en una cantera cercana a Alexandria. Entretanto, Carter convoca a varios habitantes de Alexandria para proponerles un plan: matar a Rick.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Los Lobos, el grupo con el que ya habían combatido, asalta Alexandria y empieza a acuchillar a sus ciudadanos por las calles. Durante la pelea, Enid huye de Alexandria y Ron rechaza la ayuda de Rick.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El grupo trata de reconducir a la horda de zombis para alejarla de Alexandria, pero el plan falla y Glenn y Nicholas terminan rodeados por muertos vivientes. Rick, por su parte, es atacado por los asaltantes que Morgan expulsó de Alexandria.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Morgan le explica a un asaltante al que mantiene cautivo cómo venció a la ira que le consumía y aprendió que el camino correcto es aquel que rechaza la violencia.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick regresa a Alexandria, donde el ánimo está decaído por la presencia de la horda de zombis y las secuelas del asalto sufrido. Maggie y Aaron salen en busca de Glenn. Denise pierde la confianza en sí misma, pero Tara la anima.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl se separa de Abraham y Sasha mientras regresan a Alexandria. Un trío de fugitivos captura a Daryl, aunque él trata de convencerlos de que se unan a su comunidad.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Glenn encuentra a Enid y la convence de regresar junto a él a Alexandria. Mientras, en la comunidad, Ron roba armas del arsenal y Carol se enfrenta a Morgan porque no confía en él.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: La horda de zombis invade Alexandria a través de la grieta que se produjo en el muro. Rick, Michonne, Carl, Gabriel y Deanna se ocultan en la casa de Jessie, pero se dan cuenta de que están rodeados.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Ahora que los caminantes han traspasado las barreras de Alexandría, Rick y los otros sobrevivientes deben seguir luchando para mantenerse a salvo e intentar no perder la esperanza.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El grupo cree que estar en el lado de los vivos trae responsabilidades que van más allá de la supervivencia. Desde esta perspectiva, Rick comienza una lucha consigo mismo para preservar las huellas de lo que queda de humanidad.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El grupo de Rick acompaña a Jesus a su comunidad, La Cumbre. Allí, un residente intenta matar a Gregory, el líder, por órdenes de Negan. Maggie hace un pacto con Gregory: matarán a Negan a cambio de la mitad de las provisiones que guardan.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Un nuevo enemigo amenaza la paz en Alexandria y Rick y el grupo deciden que la única manera de vencerlo es combatir.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Tras haber obtenido un éxito menor, algunos de los miembros del grupo han sido hechos prisioneros por sus nuevos enemigos y el resto de los supervivientes de Alexandria tendrá que tratar de liberarlos.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Abraham abandona a Eugene durante una misión porque él le dice que no necesita su protección. Daryl, Rosita y Denise se topan con un grupo de los Salvadores, dirigidos por Dwight, y entre los dos bandos se produce un tiroteo.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Carol desaparece de Alexandria y toda la comunidad se coordina para localizarla. Sin embargo, lo que algunos de ellos encuentran no es lo que andaban buscando.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Para salvar a Maggie, que se encuentra enferma, el grupo de Rick se aventura fuera de los muros de Alexandria. Pero los hombres de Negan los están esperando en la carretera.

programme.title: Brandon Rios vs Mike Alvarado 1
programme.desc: On October 13th, 2012, Brandon Rios fought Mike Alvarado for the WBO Latino Super Lightweight Title in Carson, California. Showing his quickness and agility, Rios put on a show with a 7th round TKO victory.

programme.title: Chris Eubank vs Nigel Benn 1
programme.desc: On November 18th, 1990, Chris Eubank fought Nigel Benn for the WBO Middleweight Title at the Resorts World Arena in Birmingham, UK. Eubank's constant pressure on Benn and powerful punching led him to stop Benn in the ninth round.

programme.title: Manny Pacquiao vs Juan Manuel Marquez 1
programme.desc: Manny Pacquiao and Juan Manuel Marquez fought their first match in 2004, resulting in a controversial draw. Both fighters displayed incredible skill, but no clear winner emerged setting the stage for their epic rivarly.

programme.title: Manny Pacquiao vs Juan Manuel Marquez 2
programme.desc: On March 15th, 2008 Manny Pacquiao faced Juan Manuel Marquez the second time at Mandalay Bay Resort in Las Vegas for the WBC World Super feather weight titles with Marquez going down in round 3 Pacquiaos win was secured by split decision.

programme.title: Manny Pacquiao vs Juan Manuel Marquez 3
programme.desc: On November 12th, 2011 Manny Pacquiao and Juan Manuel Marquez fought for the third time at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas for WBO World Welterweight titles ending in a victory for Pacquiao in this 12 round bout.

programme.title: Manny Pacquiao vs Juan Manuel Marquez 4
programme.desc: On December 8th, 2012, Manny Pacquiao and Juan Manuel Marquez fought for their fourth and final fight. The bout ended in a stunning knockout victory for Marquez, solidifying their rivalry as one of the most memorable in boxing history.

programme.title: Kelly Pavlik vs Jermain Taylor 2
programme.desc: On February 16th, 2008 Kelly Pavlik faced Jermain Taylor for a second time at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas the 12 round bout resulted in a unanimous decision win for Pavlik.

programme.title: James Toney vs Mike McCallum 1
programme.desc: On December 13th, 1991 James Toney and Mike McCallum fought eachother for the first time at the Convention Hall in Atlantic City for IBF World Middleweight title ending in a draw.

programme.title: James Toney vs Mike McCallum 2
programme.desc: On August 29th, 1992, James Toney rematched Mike McCallum for the IBF Middleweight Title in Reno. This time, Toney came out on top via a majority decision in which many believed the scorecards were too lopsided in favor of Toney.

programme.title: James Toney vs Mike McCallum 3
programme.desc: On February 22nd, 1997 James Toney and Mike McCallum face each other for the final time at the Mohegan Sun Casino in Uncasville in a strong bout that lasted 12 rounds ending in a victory for Toney.

programme.title: Iran Barkley vs Thomas Hearns 1
programme.desc: On June 6th, 1988 Iran Barkley faces Thomas Hearns for the first time at the Las Vegas Hilton Center they battle for the WBC World Middleweight title with the bout lasting 3 rounds resulting in a victory for Barkley.

programme.title: Timothy Bradley vs Manny Pacquiao I
programme.desc: On June 9th, 2012 Manny Pacquiao and Timothy Bradley started their trilogy at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas in a battle for the WBO World Welterweight title that ended in a split decision win for Timothy Bradley.

programme.title: Freddie Roach vs Joe Ruelaz
programme.desc: On August 9th, 1984, Freddie Roach fought Joe Ruelaz in a super featherweight bout in Las Vegas. The more experienced Roach made easy work of Ruelaz, stopping him in the fourth round.

programme.title: Freddie Roach vs Mario Chavez
programme.desc: On May 28th, 1981 Freddie Roach faced Mario Chavez at the Hacienda Hotel in Las Vegas resulting in a unanimous decision win for Roach.

programme.title: Oscar De La Hoya vs Julio Cesar Chavez 1
programme.desc: On June 7th, 1996 Oscar De La Hoya and Julio Cesar Chavez fought for the first time for WBC World super Lightweight titles at Caesars Palace in Las Vegas that ended by technical knockout in the fourth round giving the win to De La Hoya.

programme.title: Michael Carbajal vs Humberto Gonzalez 1
programme.desc: On March 13th, 1993, Michael Carbajal fought Humberto Gonzalez for the WBC and IBF Light Flyweight Titles in Las Vegas. After being knocked down twice earlier in the fight, Carbajal made an incredible comeback, knocking out Gonzalez in the 7th round.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Former WOW World Champion Santana Garrett gets emotional as she recounts her long journey back to WOW and why this road back means so much.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Ariel Sky fights for her freedom against her former trainer Coach Campanelli in the high stakes Freedom Match. Will Ariel be able to decide her own fate and prove her worth, or will Coach Campanelli continue pulling the strings?

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It's the high-flying debut of the bahamian beauty Sierra Breeze as she must battle Penelope Pink.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Newly crowned WOW World Champion: The Beast has finally established that she's the top of the WOW roster, but with so many predators on the hunt for gold, how long can she hold on?

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Following The Brat Pack's vicious turn on one of their own Lil J Boogie, Stephy Slays teams up to help Lil J Boogie stand up to her bullies in the ring. Reina Del Rey goes head to head with Tormenta in the Main Event.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Siren the Voodoo Doll and Chainsaw are sent into the ring by Angelica Dante to battle the sunny Spring Break 24/7's Crystal Waters and Sandy Shore. In the Main Event, Princess Aussie clashes with fellow Australian, Superhero Genesis.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The unrelenting team of Top Tier starts the night facing The Dojo Defenders who have recruited Sierra Breeze. The All American Girls are back in the ring battling Las Bandidas. In a Main Event, reigning champion The Beast takes on The Classmaster.

programme.title: Origins of WOW
programme.desc: This documentary explores the hardscrabble journey of women wrestlers,from early 20th century carnival sideshows and the male dominated world of professional wrestling,to the ultimate creation of the only all-female wrestling league in the 21st century.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: WOW's new arena is the perfect setting for the unveiling of the first-ever World Trios Championship Titles. In the Main Event, Penelope Pink and Princess Aussie will wrestle to determine the one contender for the WOW World Championship.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Lana Star is excited about two things...her team, Miami's Sweat Heat, defending their WOW World Tag Team Championships against The All American Girls, and the large amount of money The Mother Truckers owe her. And Lana's coming to collect on both!

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: David McLane's major announcement - and major reward - sends the locker reeling as the WOW Matchmaker attempts to finally uncover the assailants who attacked The Beast, who finally returns to the ring for the first time since last season.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Top Tier puts their Trios Championships on the line against The Mighty Mights and Keta Rush. Adriana Gambino makes an announcement that affects the entire locker room. In the Main Event, Tormenta and Princess Aussie team up vs Miami's Sweet Heat.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The luxury hotel bill is due and Lana Star has come to collect as Big Rig Betty and Holly Swag report for duty at Lana's mansion. Adriana Gambino debuts her new faction, The Alliance, when BK Rhythm and Gigi Gianni take on The All American Girls.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It's an action packed opening match as former champion Penelope Pink battles Tiki Chamorro. Lil J-Boogie makes her way as a singles competitor against Ice Cold. Lana Star's Fabulous Four take on The Tonga Twins in the Main Event.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi vows to overthrow Pegasus for the sake of his Grandpa. Tristan leads an exploration party to uncover Pegasus's secrets. While Joey sleeps, Bandit Keith steals from him the card that permits his entry in the final battle!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Under Pegasus's glare, Yugi is distracted from his duel with Mai. After making foolish errors and allowing Mai to gain a huge advantage with her Harpie's Pet Dragon, will Yugi gather his focus or succumb to the pressure?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has rebounded from her previous loss to Joey to become a better duelist. Has Yugi learned from his loss to Kaiba, or is the emotional defeat still weighing on his heart? The answer is in the cards!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey searches for the card that permits him to enter the final battle, not realizing Bandit Keith has stolen it. As he struggles to accept the fact that Serenity will be blind forever, he receives help from a new friend!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Bandit Keith's Machine deck forces Joey to take the defensive, Joey mimics Keith's battle strategy to metalize his Red-Eyes Black Dragon! Is victory assured, or does the cheater Bandit Keith literally have one last card up his sleeve?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey challenges Yugi for the right to face Pegasus. In a battle between friends, a fierce match ensues between the two people who know each other's strategies and cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is shocked as Joey uses the Time Wizard card on him. It's the very same card Yugi gave Joey as a sign of friendship!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi prepares for the ultimate battle against Pegasus with the souls of Grandpa, Kaiba, and Mokuba on the line.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus punishes Yugi using the same Toon Deck and mind-reading abilities he used on Kaiba. As Pegasus turns Yugi's monsters against him, Yugi loses the will to battle. Will Pegasus capture Yugi's soul into a card, just like Kaiba?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has found a counter to Pegasus's mind-reading ability: Yugi switches back and forth between his two souls! Yugi is able to destroy Pegasus's Toon World, but the duel has just only begun. The next level of the deadly Shadow Game is about to start!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi crumples under the power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi's chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus summons Relinquished, a fearsome monster that can consume Yugi's Duel Monsters! Yugi counters with… Kuriboh?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi's mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rebecca mistakenly believes that Grandpa stole the Blue-Eyes White Dragon from her grandfather. Yugi must defend the Blue-Eyes White Dragon to teach her that it's not the power of the cards, but the heart that's in them that counts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of Kaiba Corporation trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game. Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from… Mai? But can YUGI and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past a Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mailose all their life points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Duke Devlin defeats Joey and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey's freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi's position is helpless!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Duke's all-powerful Orogoth The Relentless dices Yugi's entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: An arcane fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle and Yugi must defeat him in a duel to win it back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The mysterious menace controlling Bandit Keith shatters the Millennium Puzzle into pieces before setting the dueling arena ablaze. Can Yugi put the Millennium Puzzle back together and save the spirit before the entire room is engulfed in flames?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed. Using the magic of the Millennium Necklace, Egyptian historian Ishizu Ishtar shows Kaiba how Duel Monsters was played millenniums ago.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The spirit of the Millennium Puzzle realizes that his memories of ancient Egypt have faded, but Tea helps him uncover the mysteries of his past.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi learns that he was a powerful Pharaoh who saved the world five thousand years ago, and he must now save the world again.
